page.name: Fear
page.description: People are missing, strange creatures are running around... what is going on in Verteroche?

properties.name: Fear
properties.description: People are missing, strange creatures are running around... what is going on in Verteroche?
properties.complete: Turns out that the Phobeist was hired by Theano. Whatever he has planned, it seems he's one step closer to its completion.

page.name: Brand of Emryhs I
page.description: Left behind by the Phobeist. The materials of its construction are unrecognizable, and wielding it fills you with a conflicting sense of despair and hope.
